tool_description: Assesses liquidity conditions for assets to optimize trade execution timing and sizing.
error_messages: Invalid asset symbol: Asset not found or not tradeable.
Invalid period: Assessment period must be positive integer between 1 and 365.
Insufficient data: Not enough trading data for liquidity assessment.
usage: Provide asset_symbol and optionally assessment_period to analyze recent liquidity conditions.

liquidity_rating.description: Liquidity rating: excellent, good, fair, poor
